title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 10 categories on the x axis representing Video Game, and Number of hours in millions in each Video Game on the y axis.
Fortnite is higher than any other categories with value 24.8, followed by League of Legends, and GTA V. Down to category Apex Legends with the lowest value of 4.0.
The highest value at Fortnite is almost 6.2 times larger than the minimum value of Apex Legends.
The highest value at Fortnite is almost 6.2 times larger than the minimum value of Apex Legends.
The difference between the max Video Game Fortnite and min Video Game Apex Legends is 20.8.
